text.__SUMMARY__: Peperomia vulcanica is a species of herbaceous flowering plants of the family Piperaceae.
text.Description: It is a creeping plant, rooting at nodes. It has erect lateral branches that are 20–30 cm tall.
text.Distribution:
The species is found in rocky areas and rarely as an epiphyte at 250 to 2400 m elevation in São Tomé and Príncipe, Annobón and Liberia.
